{{categorie.name}}

import { HttpClient, HttpClientModule } from '@angular/common/http'; import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'register-post', templateUrl: './register-post.html', styleUrls: ['./register-post.css'] }) export class RegisterPostComponent { public categories: Categories[] = []; public static UrlCategories: string = 'https://localhost:7080/Category/GetAllCategories'; constructor(private http: HttpClient, private httpModule: HttpClientModule) { } onClickSubmit(data: { title: string, description: string}) { alert(data.title); alert(data.description); } returnAllCategories() { this.http.get(RegisterPostComponent.UrlCategories).subscribe(data => { this.categories = data; }, error => console.log(error)); } } interface Categories { id: number; name: string; }
